original_text: God saw how corrupt the earth had become, for all the people on earth had corrupted their ways.
korean_text: 하나님이 보신즉 땅이 부패하였으니 이는 땅에서 모든 혈육 있는 자의 행위가 부패함이었더라

sentences.original_text: God saw how corrupt the earth had become
for all the people on earth had corrupted their ways
sentences.korean_translation: 땅 위의 모든 사람이 자신의 길을 부패시켰기 때문이다
